entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
